The same issue still exists.

body:
I tried the below:
```
--- a/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_test.py
+++ b/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_test.py
@@ -1009,7 +1009,7 @@ class MomentsTest(test_lib.TestCase):
     for mu in [0.0, 1.0, 1e3]:
       for sigma in [1.0, 0.1]:
         for keep_dims in [True, False]:
-          input_values = np.random.rand(*input_shape) * sigma + mu
+          input_values = np.random.rand(*input_shape).astype(np.float32) * sigma + mu
           expected_mean = np.mean(
               input_values, axis=moments_axes, keepdims=keep_dims)
           expected_var = np.var(
```
The same issue still exists.
